post.author: Brendan
post.content:
Hello Brendan,

It was nice speaking with you. I have reviewed your CV. I have a good PERMANENT position that might closely match your skills. It is for a very large company with a great working environment. They are looking for someone with great J2EE skills and good communications skills. I will look out for contract positions for you since you are looking for contracts only.
Here's the job description. Please forward it liberally to your Java/J2EE associates and JAVA community that might be interested in the position. They can contact me directly if they like. I have many other positions. Thank you.

I have enclosed details for you below.

Position: Programmer/Analyst/Developer

Mandatory Skills: J2EE (5 years); WEBSPHERE (3 years); DB2 (3 years); WSAD (3 years); UML (3 years); JMS (3 years); Nice-to-Have Skills:

Location: Scarborough (Ontario, Canada)

Duration: Permanent

Salary: Around $75,000 per year

Start Date: ASAP

Job Description:

• Conduct initial analysis of user requirements

• Design codes and test programmes

• provide guidance and direction to several project team members

QUALIFICATIONS / SKILLS:

• Degree in computer sciences

• 4 years minimum experience in J2EE design and development

• 5 years experience in Java development including JSP, Servlet and EJB

• 5 years experience n web-based application design and development (HTTP,HTTPS,HTML/DHTML, Javascript etc.)

• 3 years experience in WebSphere v.5 Network deployment model including configuration and deployment

• 3 years of WSAD 5+ experience

• 3 years’ experience with JMS MQ series including MQ manager set-up and configuration

• 5 years’ experience with JDBS and standard SQL, 4 years’ DB2 experience (including DB2 connector, Command Centre, Command Line Processor)

• 4 years’ experience implementing MVC model using Apache’s Struts framework

• 3 years’ experience with Unit test framework, and software Build and deployment

• 3 years’ software configuration experience (Source Code Control, including CVS etc.)

• 5 years’ experience in Application Integration (e.g. Single Sign On, cross platform communication) • 3 years’ UML experience (Diagrams and Tools e.g. Rational Rose/Together)

• 3 years’ experience in test cycle (test case design, stress/load testing, regression testing)

•Experience in Mainframe, Lotus Notes and Content Management Systems, specifically Vignette, are definite assets

•Ability to manage 2-3 projects concurrently and shift priorities as required

•Ability to provide guidance and direction to 2-4 team members and vendors

•Experience in all phases of project lifecycle and documentation of same

•Good communication skills and ability to interact effectively with users and ISD management

•Ability to manage requirements against deliverables in terms of quality and tight timelines


Kind regards,

Rodney Yap

Technical Recruiter
Direct Line: 647-288-2545
Toll Free: 1-800-461-4878 x 324
Fax: 416-483-8102
rodneyy@procom.ca
post.title: Sr. J2EE developer, Perm, Scarborough
